Articles.Content:
Today i played KSP i don't play ksp for long time but i managed to send probe jool, and this i message when clicked material bay:D

I come across this several time when i played KSP in pasy but it always make me laught

i want to send probe into Jool atmosphere to get science points from barometer, but i did not have enough fuel, next time i develop Ion engine technology or install RCS truster
Yeah, I love the movie references.

It's one of the cooler science messages, yes.

By the way, if you want to impact Jool, arrange it nice and far out , eg with a course correction between the orbits of Duna and Dres, and you won't need much fuel.

I also saw a surface sample on duns that said "to satisfy your Curiousity (yes with a capital letter) you drill into the rock and you think that it would be a lot easier if you had some sort of pusulating drill on a robotic arm.

Yeah, I love the movie references.

Yes, I guess.

P.S. The books are better

P.P.S. Adaptation 2061 when?

Edited March 4, 2015 by Axelord FTW

P.P.S. Adaptation 2061 when?

Kubricks dead. Maybe Michael Bay could take over...

kubricks dead. Maybe michael bay could take over...

noooooo!!!

Every time I see 2001 a Space Odyssey reference I get a little bummed out.

It's 2015 and we are not capable of the space travel depicted, when I was a kid I was looking forward to 2001 minus mentally unbalanced sentient computers.
